text: Nicolas Cantu (born September 8, 2003), also known as Junky Janker, is an American actor, animator, stand-up comedian and YouTuber. ==Career== Cantu is best known for his role as Gumball in The Amazing World of Gumball, and as Prince James in Sofia the First for 14 episodes from 2016 to 2018. On YouTube, his channel currently has over 400 thousand subscribers. In 2020, Cantu starred in The Walking Dead spin-off series set a decade after the original one, named The Walking Dead: World Beyond, and recently in 2023, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 2017 Hey Arnold!: The Jungle Movie Curly Voice; TV Movie 2017 The Impossible Joy Tomas Short Film 2017 Vikes Joey 2022 The Fabelmans Hark 2023 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem Leonardo Voice ===Television=== Year Title Role 2016–2017 Lego Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures Rowan Freemaker (voice) 2016–2018 Future-Worm!
